attributes.action: Prevent the Sale of fireworks for domestic use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to try to stop fireworks being sold to private residents and to therefore prevent the firing of them at all times of the night.

This is not to say the fireworks are completely banned, but to the extent of atleast needing to own a liscence to buy them. Ideally sale of the fireworks only for publicly organised event use only or private company use.

This is so that during the months of October and November, the cities don't sound like warzones.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
